meanings.definition: Stereoregularities: the quality or state of being stereoregular
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the stereoregularities of the crystal structure.
meanings.sent2: The artist admired the stereoregularities in the geometric pattern.
meanings.sent3: The detective found the stereoregularities in the suspect's alibi quite intriguing.
meanings.sent4: The music of the orchestra flowed with the stereoregularities of a well-tuned instrument.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used a model to explain the concept of stereoregularities to the students.

meanings.definition: Stereoregularities: a pattern or arrangement that is consistent and uniform
meanings.sent1: The architect designed the building with stereoregularities in mind.
meanings.sent2: The garden had a beautiful display of stereoregularities in its layout.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked about the stereoregularities of his daily routine.
meanings.sent4: The team worked together with the stereoregularities of a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The bookshelf showcased the stereoregularities of color and size in its arrangement.
